A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is one of the most disappointing movies I have ever seen. The entire 2nd act of the movie is just horrible\, The new character Rose takes center stage and that is plain stupid because she ruins everything in the end as well. Some nice action sequences with Oscar Issacs Character but that's mostly it because Rey is on an island the entire movie with a old Luke Skywalker who was writin as a joke. After all Star Wars the Last Jedi is not a good movie in any way and is and embarrassment to all Star Wars Movies.
